title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin advises everyone take a breath and relax after the Rams suffer another big loss by comparing them to last season’s Super Bowl champion Buccaneers. He believes Pete Carroll trying to blame the referees for their loss to the Packers when the offense scored 0 points is further proof it might be time for Seattle to find a new head coach. He also shares his Herd Hierarchy after week 10 of the NFL season. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion Malcolm Jenkins joins the show to describe what he saw from Patriots rookie QB Mac Jones and stopping Tom Brady.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
